desc.1: Lapel collar dress with V-neck and short cuffed sleeves. Front pockets and back patch pockets. Washed effect. Front metal button closure.

desc.3: Flowy sleeveless V-neck dress. Ruching detail at sides.
desc.4: Midi dress with fluid draped neckline and adjustable halter with ties at neck.

desc.6: Sleeveless dress with asymmetric neckline. Ruched detail.
desc.7: Dress made of knit fabric. Buttoned halter neck. Open back. Ruching detail at sides. Tonal interior lining. Back hidden in-seam zip closure.
desc.8: Mini dress with straight neckline and double spaghetti straps in contrasting satin effect fabric. Textured floral detail and draped fabric. Contrasting interior lining. Back hidden in-seam zip closure.
desc.9: Dress made of linen and cotton. Lapel collar and short cuffed sleeves with tab and button. Side vents at hem. Front button closure and self belt.
desc.10: Skirt with a high elastic waist. Front patch pockets with jewel appliqu√©s.
desc.11: Skirt with a high waist and five pockets. Washed effect. Front slit. Front zip and metal button closure.
desc.12: Round neck long sleeve cardigan. Flower-shaped textured fabric detail. Front hidden snap button closure.
desc.13: We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the social, environmental, and health and safety standards of our products. To assess its compliance, we have developed an audit.
